page.title: 09STEEL HOUSE
page.content: Steel House was built,and opened in 1977 ,it cost Â£10_11 million to build and is the main office and distribution centre for Teeside works. Thr Teeside works include Skinningrove,Redcar,Lakenby and part of Hartlepool. The main building is in 5 floors and covers 2 acres,it employs 624 people although it was planned for 1200.The employees work on a flexi-time system. In the building there are these facilities:Bank,sshop,canteen,and a medical centre.There are ten main departments in the building and smaller departments within these. There is over Â£1 million worth of computers inside the computer centre which is directly linked to the other main B.S.C divisions.Steel House advisers are sent out to contries to help them develop the steel business.
